experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implemented data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore.
reference_context: Software Engineer Intern - Python Developer, DevOps Engineer
Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline in a distributed system
experiences.reasoning: The role description involves tasks associated with software development, data processing, and DevOps, aligning well with the title of Software Development Engineer.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support. Engineered GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines. Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation. Documented technical designs and deployed code packages.
experiences.reasoning: The main tasks and technologies addressed in the description match the responsibilities typically associated with a software development engineer role within a financial software context.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshooted bugs and optimized the system for real-time sensor data transfer.
reference_context: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device
experiences.reasoning: This experience focuses on software development for embedded systems using C++, aligning with the title of Embedded C++ Developer.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for sensor data mining using Python. Designed custom-built library to process a large number of objects rapidly and accurately using linear regression.
reference_context: Worked under the guidance of Ms. Vanita Agarwal
Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts
experiences.reasoning: The role was focused on Python development for data mining applications, which aligns well with the responsibilities and title of Python Developer.
